title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Nick Wright on Brady Retirement, Insufferable Aaron, Aqib Talib on McVay Culture, Packers L + AFC/NFC Champ. Picks
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Nick Wright on Brady Retirement, Insufferable Aaron, Aqib Talib on McVay Culture, Packers L + AFC/NFC Champ. Picks
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of the week (3:00), including what's next for Sean Payton, and why Aaron Rodgers has no one to blame but himself for the Packers disappointing home playoff loss to the Niners. Then ,Nick Wright (First Things First co-host) discusses potential landing spots for Rodgers if he leaves Green Bay (10:00), if Brady's family should urge him to keep playing (16:00), and why Aaron has become so insufferable (21:00). Super Bowl Champ - and host of the Catchin' Fades podcast - Aqib Talib explains what it's like to play for Sean McVay (31:00), reasons behind the Packers loss to the 49ers (35:00), Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if he's a sharp or square with his AFC (Bengals/Chiefs) and NFC (Niners/Rams) Championship Game picks (39:00)

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
